overview: Look up in the sky and find the brightest star located at the northern part focusing on the direction that can lead you to the right path where you will never get lost again. Insecurities drowned someone's soul that decided to tarnish the feelings of a long lost love. Will the impostor illuminate the same love or will the true person shine the brightest to be recognized again for the second time? Will the impostor be saved by the silent lover? Will they still remember the promises drawn by the brightest star?
title: Island: The Movie
